original_title: Eric Bibb: Live at The Basement
overview: Recorded in spectacular 5.1 surround sound, this DVD captures Eric Bibb and bass player Dave Bronze in one of the finest blues acoustic performances The Basement Club has ever seen. Eric Bibb Live at The Basement is a truly remarkable DVD featuring one of the most compelling live performers in the world today.
title: Eric Bibb: Live at The Basement
